name: Real Army Mission
description:
Gangster terrorists have occupied middle east village and doing a lot of crime there, your duty as a special force trained for such deadly operation to eliminate gangster terrorists from village and stop crime rate and bring peace back to the village burning from gangster crimes.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES:
- Eye Catching Realistic Environment
- Various Deadly Missions
- Adventurous & Thrilling Gameplay
- Multiple Guns Selections
- Story Line Missions
- Challenging Locations
- Powerful Weapons
